p: We included all deliveries, spontaneous abortions or pregnancy terminations for medical reasons between January 2016 and December 2016, 3 months after the official declaration of the end of the outbreak. Women without ZIKV serology were excluded. We also included women with positive RT-PCR even if they did not have any serology. Fig 1 shows the study flowchart. The STROBE checklist is indicated in S1 Checklist.
